characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Model with a Vexilla Defensor only. The Fulminaris Aggressor replaces that model's vexilla: it loses the Custodes Vexilla ability. Instead, friendly IMPERIUM INFANTRY and BIKER units within 6" of the bearer in the Morale phase automatically pass Morale tests, and the Fulminaris Aggressor has the following weapon profile:
